A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really did not enjoy this movie. Rain Johnson completely ruined Luke Skywalker. I waited 20+ years since my first viewing RotJ imagining how amazing Luke would as a Jedi Master. Huge letdown. Not to mention Rey is 100% a Mary Sue\, mainly due to the poor development of the character. Three lessons in and she's moving mountains of boulders. Vice Admiral whoever was a complete throw away character. This movie had zero depth. Poor writing poor storytelling. I think Disney's ruining the franchise.
